overview:
Jodok Batlogg is CEO of luminance.tv an Austrian based startup for PaaS for Internet Video offerings.

Before that he was CTO of sevenload, a Social Video Network for premium TV content, music videos and web tv shows.

He also was CTO and executive of VZnet Netzwerke Ltd.- the company behind the social networks schuelerVZ, studiVZ and meinVZ. At this time these portals were Germans most trafficked sites.

Jodok co-founded Lovely Systems in Dornbirn, Austria. Between 2005 and 2009 he and his young and highly motivated team of developers delivered tomorrow’s Web portals for major European publishing houses.

Whether Jodok Batlogg follows the Web or the Web follows him is still uncertain. However, they do go very well together for more than ten years now. Being a visionary, Jodok Batlogg never follows trends. He forsees them. Providing his customers with decisive advantages in competition.

Lovely Systems was one of the first companies in Europe offering Cloud computing Web portal development. With their project zehn.de Lovely Systems just realized one of the first applications worldwide on Google App Engine.

As a member of the Plone and later Zope Foundation Board of Directors Jodok Batlogg significantly contributed to the successful development of the well-known open source content management system.
